TEXT.TITLE: DUFF AND PHELPS UPGRADES BAXTER TRAVENOL <BAX>
TEXT.BODY: Duff and Phelps said it is upgrading to Duff 1- (one minus) from Duff 2, its rating on Baxter Travenol Inc's commercial paper totaling about 541 mln dlrs. The upgrading reflects the company's significant improvement made in reducing debt since its 1985 acquisition of American Hospital Supply Corp, it said. Reuter
